title: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Mykhaylivka of Kherson region, Nikopol of Dnipropetrovsk region, -...
content: At Kherson direction Russian army shelled Kherson city and Mykhaylivka of Kherson region, Nikopol of Dnipropetrovsk region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
